verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I am the Music Man
I come from down your way
And I can play
Others:What can you play?
I play the piano

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Pi-a, pi-a, pi-an-o
Pi-an-o, Pi-an-o
Pi-a, pi-a, pi-an-o
Pi-a, Pi-an-o

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
What can you play
I play trumbone

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Um-pa um-pa um-pa-pa
Um-pa-pa um-pa-pa
Um-pa um-pa um-pa-pa
Um-pa um-pa-pa

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
What can you play
I play the big base drum

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Boom-boom boom-boom boom-boom tsh boom-boom tsh boom-boom tsh boom-boom boom-boom tsh boom-boom boom-boom tsh
